title: "League of Legends (TM) Client Not Responding"
body:
Every time after champ select, i enter into the loading screen, it takes me a while for the players to appear, when i ctrl+alt+del, the League of Legends TM Client's status is not responding, but finally i enter the game late, the the time is already passed 10 mins.
Any solutions? I would appreciate your help!

replies.body: The game starts very fine but around minute 25-30 it stops. It doesn't even say"trying to reconnect". After I start the task manager and the initially page "Leauge of Legends" is ok but the (TM) Client is not responding. Please help!

This sounds like a network problem that's having some problems reaching the game server, and leaving you behind.  My suggestion would be to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get back in-game.  Let me know if you run into any issues.
